name: Salesforce JB Custom Activity
description: Create a Journey Builder Custom Activity for making an http request.

APP_NAME.description: Name of the Heroku application above (either Heroku default or your custom name)

KEY.description: Application extension key - this must match exactly what is entered into the Journey Builder creation screen.

CA_IMG_40.description: URL for the 40x40 pixel Custom Activity image.

CA_IMG_15.description: URL for the 15x15 pixel Custom Activity image.

EDIT_HEIGHT.description: Height of the Custom Activity edit window in pixels.

EDIT_WIDTH.description: Height of the Custom Activity edit window in pixels.

CLIENT_ID.description: Client id of this activity in the app center. (not used currently)

CLIENT_SECRET.description: Client secret of this activity in app center. (not used currently)

ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION.description: Description of what the Custom Activity does
